wrong-scale.png.description: A tweet from CNBC, showing a graph of the stock market. The x-axis runs from 9:30am to 4pm. The y-axis goes from 33,840 to 34,160. The market dropped 0.78%, resulting in a steep drop on the graph.

wrong-use-of-chart.png.description: A pie chart showing percentage of each of six languages spoken at home for a sample of 67 students at El Paso High School.
